byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Al Baker, Nicholas Casey, David W. Dunlap, Lisa W. Foderaro, Sandra E. Garcia, David Gonzalez, C. J. Hughes, Benjamin Mueller, Sharon Otterman, Kate Pastor, Noah Remnick, Liz Robbins, Rick Rojas, Marc Santora, Nate Schweber, Kirk Semple, Jeffrey E. Singer, John Surico and Rebecca White.

abstract: Pope Francis tours Manhattan, blessing crowds of people throughout the day, before delivering homily during mass at Madison Square Garden; makes stops at World Trade Center site, school in East Harlem and Central Park, where he is greeted by tens of thousands of people.
lead_paragraph: The pope, who was met by adoring crowds at every stop in New York, capped his electric visit by celebrating a Mass at Madison Square Garden on Friday night.

headline.main: Pope Francis, in New York, Takes On Extremism and Inequality
headline.print_headline: Mixing in New York, Pope Recalls the Forgotten

snippet: The pope, who was met by adoring crowds at every stop in New York, capped his electric visit by celebrating a Mass at Madison Square Garden on Friday night.
